item.description:
The fourth in our series of jam sessions -- If you sing or play an instrument, we'd love to have you come and join us! We'll likely have guitars, hand drums, keyboard and a microphone with a small amp. Rock/jazz/folk/pop standards are the usual fare.
If you've got a song you'd like to prepare beforehand, please post it here so we can learn it.

Bob, are you willing to learn some tunes for the occasion again? :D

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Late Summer Jam Session @ Victoria's
